title: Doubt whether I read Fatiha or not, what to do? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Sumeyya from the UK Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu and then I was planning to do Sujood Sahih at the end um but I didn't know the ruling whether I should do Sujood Sahih because I've Sumeyya how many times do you make such doubts? um right now no no in prayer in prayer how often do you get these doubts that you miss something? this doubt was like some time ago so so it's Alhamdulillah it's once in a blue moon correct? recited it or not does not require Sujood Sahih so if you did not offer Sujood Sahih then you're clean and fine and there is nothing wrong with your prayer you
